channel.title: About on Mingrui Zhang (张铭睿)
channel.description: Recent content in About on Mingrui Zhang (张铭睿)

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Mingrui Zhang. I am a PhD student at Imperial College London, advised by Matthew Piggott. I obtained my Master degree from Imperial College London and Bachelor's degree from Zhejiang University. My research focuses on differentiable physical simulation and applying machine learning techniques to enhance simulation.
